feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: Who Did J.K. Rowling Become?
entry.content:
Post 190288 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Late delete on this, but on reflection I agree with the argument that this could probably just be a link in, and extension of, the existing discussion of Rowling et al in this recent post. -- cortex
entry.summary: Post 190288 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Late delete on this, but on reflection I agree with the argument that this could probably just be a link in, and extension of, the existing discussion of Rowling et al in this recent post. -- cortex

entry.title: Melania Trump Got an “Einstein Visa”
entry.content:
Post 190240 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This is sort of an odd post to make a year after the fact and on the other side of Trump's administration. The story an issue could be fine to post about but I think framing and sources that don't have that double-take feeling of talking about the past admin in the present tense would help there. -- cortex
entry.summary: Post 190240 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This is sort of an odd post to make a year after the fact and on the other side of Trump's administration. The story an issue could be fine to post about but I think framing and sources that don't have that double-take feeling of talking about the past admin in the present tense would help there. -- cortex

entry.title: the crows and their tef
entry.content:

This post was deleted for the following reason: The crows are awesome but it sounds like the photographer is grieving a very fresh loss and the attention MetaFilter is bringing him is intrusive. Maybe repost in a month? -- Eyebrows McGee

entry.title: #blueskying A New Social Media Standard
entry.content:
Post 189999 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: The timeline in the post seems misleading enough to be a problem for discussion (the tweet is from Dec 2019, it's not a response to the trump ban); maybe find more recent news on this if it still is a going concern? -- LobsterMitten
